# conflict_prefer()

## Brief Description

The `conflict_prefer()` function is part of the {pacman} package in R. This function is designed to resolve conflict between R packages by selecting one of the conflicting packages as the preferred package. 

## What Package Contains It

conflict_prefer() is found within the {pacman} package. The full library command is `library(pacman::conflict_prefer)`
